text:
Least surprising news of the day to me.

Nissan confirms that its UK operations are unsustainable in the event of no deal.

@piersmorgan @afneil @Peston - please do not let this get buried in all the other stuff today.

No deal is not an option

https://t.co/7v2MWfsruP
